name: nvzcl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: eqeltrd(c1, c2, cfv(cgi, cfv(cpv, c0)), wcel(c0, cnv))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wceq(c1, cfv(cgi, cfv(cpv, c0))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(cfv(cgi, cfv(cpv, c0)), c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈ c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 =(GId `(+v ` c0)))
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec →(GId `(+v ` c0))∈ c2)

cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈ c2)

⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec →(GId `(+v ` c0))∈ c2)

cumulated.origin:

⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec →(GId `(+v ` c0))∈ c2)
⊣ (+v ` c0)=(+v ` c0)

comment: Closure law for the zero vector of a normed complex vector space. (Contributed by NM, 27-Nov-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
